name: ICP deployment in AWS
description: IBM Cloud Private Deployment in Amazon Web Services

metadata.displayName: IBM Cloud Private Deployment in Amazon Web Services
metadata.longDescription: Important note: This deployment may incur cost to your AWS account

bullets.title: Clouds
bullets.description:
• Amazon Web Services (AWS)
  • IBM Cloud/Softlayer

bullets.title: Default virtual machine settings
bullets.description:
• AWS:
    • Flavor: Size = db.t2.micro, Storage = 10GB
    • Network: Private IP - in 10.0.1.0/24, Public IP - Computed
    • Firewall:
      • Ingress - Only allows SSH, ICMP, TCP 3306 for all sources;
      • Egress - All
  • IBM Cloud:
    • Flavor: Cores = 1, Memory = 1GB, Storage = 25GB SAN
    • Network: Private IP - Computed, Public IP - Computed
    • Firewall: Not enabled
